text: "I'm hopeful this group of veterans is eager to get back at it and bounce back next year. They're going to push our culture." - Green
user_description: The official account of the Vancouver Canucks | #WeAreAllCanucks

text: "I don't play mind games. Players know where they stand with me, good or bad. I'll push my players, that's what good coaches do." - Green
user_description: The official account of the Vancouver Canucks | #WeAreAllCanucks

text: "I expect a lot of my players. I want players to succeed. I want to push a 15-goal scorer to become a 25-goal scorer." - Green
